PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06162022-06-02,  ,  ,  ISI,  , 
ActInvestment Canada Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Security Review of Investments Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL SECURITY REVIEW OF INVESTMENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) create a voluntary filing option for foreign investors which do not require a filing under the Investment Canada Act; and (2) provide the Government 45 days to initiate review of investments for investors who file voluntarily, and up to five years for investors who do not file voluntarily.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0124 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
